Text: @aakela Thank you, it was my pleasure. I'll see you all #Bigdata enthusiasts at #TiECon on May 17-18  #TiEChat
@Astra_9 There is a high-quality session with Stephen Brobst, Anjul Bhambri & Milind B. on the role of data warehouses in #Bigdata #TieChat
@Astra_9 there is an excellent session on Cross Industry Use Cases of #Bigdata - Wells Fargo, Kaiser, Disney, Netflix.
@amandadayca Yes! Rayid Ghani will talk about his experiences in leveraging data to direct the campaign trajectory onto victory!!
@aakela Keep an open mind; meet fellow enthusiasts; find your space; join the #Bigdata movement!
@aakela Lots of insights from the best respected technology leaders in the #Bigdata space -density of knowledge doesn't get better than this
@pramod_patel @dpatil DJ will talk about how anyone can become a data scientist (the sexiest job of 21st century) :-)
@aakela In #Bigdata primer, Piyush and I will categorize the space & explain how parts play together in the #bigdata space. #TiEChat
@cheems_ We have a really strong VC panel talk about how they pick their investments in #Bigdata -Lightspeed,NEA, Intel, Clearstone #TiEChat
@Astra_9 SQL apps will co-exist with #Bigdata apps; #Bigdata apps will add new value from new kinds of data.  #TiEChat
@pramod_patel There are startups doing this today - connect your phone with your home systems & build adaptive models using logs #TiEChat
@JMEHTA0925 Focus on differentiation and your unique value - focus on adding value to your customer; find your place & play strong! #TiEChat
@amandadayca also an attempt to improve #Bigdata field to higher achievement - entrepreneurs who learn from #Bigdata speakers #TiEChat
@amandadayca Its my way of giving back to the community that helped me when I started my journey with @asterdata #TiEChat
@TiEcon We have Peter Norvig (Director of Research, Google), DJ Patil (Data Scientist champ!); Rayid Ghani (Obama Campaign); & more #TiEChat
@aakela super excited about the #TiECon line-up!!! We have Eric B14 (CTO & Founder of Horton Works) and Max S. (CEO of 10gen), #TiEChat
@Astra_9 A lot of entrepreneurial opportunities in consulting services. A lot on processing engines, a lot in #Bigdata apps. #TiEChat
@aakela safer online & offline activity, better customizable experiences; lesser fraud & better security; safer airplane engines. #TiEChat
@aakela #Bigdata enables lots of amazing applications that were not possible earlier. E.g., better social connections, safer online #TiEChat
@peersnet if you are a first time #Bigdata user, start with a business intent in mind. Don't start without a purpose in mind! #TiEChat
@peersnet First-time users can learn a lot from use-case stories; then pick up technology elements as they go along. #TiEChat
@amandadayca We are seeing a lot of #Bigdata uses around Clickstream analytics, Customer management, Fraud prevention, & more. #TiEChat
#Bigdata enables all kinds of data to be stored on 1 platform - & that is exciting. We can get SQL & non-SQL value out of all data. #TiEChat
@aakela We have built large DBs in the past that were 100% Relational in nature and used SQL to process. #TiEChat
@aakela @Teradata is the leader in Unified Data Architecture - offering best in class products for EDW, Discovery and Hadoop. #TiEChat
@aakela I was Founder and CEO of Aster Data, the makers of the first #Bigdata enterprise platform. Teradata acquired Aster in 2011. #TiEChat
Hello Everyone! Big nod to #Bigdata enthusiasts @TiECon #TiEChat
Oracle will invent a "Next Slide Clicker" and call it "ExaClicker" - and Larry will say it is "another piece of magic"! http://t.co/187E5WI3
Shout out to @CapitalistGreen - great conversation over dinner - welcome to the Bay Area!
Back from a fantastic Teradata Partners User Group Conference #tdpug11
Fascinating anecdotes in Bloomberg's how to guide: http://t.co/NCHB4iUA
RT @targyros: Aster's new product launch (and slide) just made it into NY Times Square! #bigdata http://t.co/DnjplM9V
